text: Expression of <extra_id_0> c-fos <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , <extra_id_0> c-jun <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> jun B <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> in peripheral blood lymphocytes from young and elderly adults .

The expression of <extra_id_0> c-fos <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , <extra_id_0> c-jun <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> jun B <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> proto-oncogenes was studied in <extra_id_0> phytohemagglutinin <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( <extra_id_0> PHA <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ) activated peripheral blood lymphocytes ( PBL ) from young and aged humans .

Specific mRNAs for <extra_id_0> c-fos <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> c-jun <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> were detectable within 30 min after cell activation and reached maximal levels within 2 h . Both <extra_id_0> c-fos <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> jun B <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> mRNAs decreased to pre - activation levels within 6 h , while <extra_id_0> c-jun <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> mRNA remained elevated .

In <extra_id_0> PHA <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - activated PBL , no age-related differences were observed in <extra_id_0> c-fos <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> or <extra_id_0> jun B <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> mRNA expression .

However , <extra_id_0> c-jun <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> mRNA levels decreased significantly ( 1.73 +/- 0.08 vs . 1.16 +/- 0.09 arbitrary units , P < 0.01 , young vs . old ) in PBL from elderly individuals activated with <extra_id_0> PHA <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> .

Because previous work has demonstrated that T cells from elderly individuals may display normal proliferative responses when activated via the anti - <extra_id_0> CD2 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> pathway , <extra_id_0> c-jun <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> jun B <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> mRNA expression was also studied in anti - <extra_id_0> CD2 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - activated purified T cells .
No age-related differences were found in the expression of either of these two proto-oncogenes by anti - <extra_id_0> CD2 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> activated T cells .

These results suggest that the decreased <extra_id_0> IL-2 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> production and proliferative response displayed by <extra_id_0> PHA <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - activated PBL from elderly adults may be related to age-related changes in <extra_id_0> c-jun <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> mRNA expression and in the ratio of <extra_id_0> c-fos <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> to <extra_id_0> c-jun <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> mRNA .
